jobDescription: Data is central to Twitch’s decision-making process, and analysts are a critical component to evangelize data-driven decision making in all of our operations. As an analyst at Twitch, you will be in on the ground floor with the Video team, shaping the way video quality of service is measured, defining what questions should be asked around expansion, and scaling analytics methods and tools to support our growing business. You will lead the way for high quality, high velocity decisions for your team.For this role, we’re looking for an experienced data analyst who will assist Video senior leadership and engineering with business and product analysis. You will define core KPIs, help plan service expansion, and ensure the impact from major service changes are well understood. Working directly with senior leadership, you will be responsible for guiding the team's thought process when it comes to using data to direct both business and high-leverage engineering efforts.Responsibilities Efficiently prioritize to supplement day-to-day operations with data and processes that scale -- provide teams with ad-hoc analysis, automated reports and dashboards, and self-service reporting tools that accurately reflect the health of their products and help them track their progress towards their goals.Partner with engineering to build the foundation and technical framework to maximize efficacy of video tools by solidifying tracking infrastructure and automation.Have an opinion and standardize delivery of evidence to support product decisions around goals, metrics and product performance.Maintain a culture of high quality output and exceptional customer service: effectively communicate at all levels, ensure that work gets done well and on time, respond effectively to unexpected obstacles and reallocate resources as necessary.Identify opportunities for developing new data sources, and provide technical leadership around making those data sources high quality and broadly available.Champion data-driven decision-making in your team and throughout the company.Requirements 2+ years of engineering, analysis, statistics, product operations or equivalent experience.Exceptional SQL skills. Your ability to tap into our data pipeline will be the key to your success.Good understanding of data structures and pipelines. Experience with data instrumentation, interpretation and visualization tools (Mode, Tableau).Fluency in data analysis, including experimentation, data visualization, defining KPIs, and communication around data to inform the success of the business and its features.Detail-oriented with superior organizational skills.
